name: Don't Panic! (itch) (Super Serious)
description:
Find your way through a maze of childish nightmares. Don't get caught or you might wake your parents and get in trouble. Life is unfair, but at least it builds character... right?

GMTK 2020 Jam entry

HOW TO PLAY:

W / A / S / D - Move (one step at a time)

Cursor - Look Direction

Left Click - Shoot / Reload / Recover Dropped Gun

Enemies are only visible inside your torch light, and they only move when you move or act (but they can be cheeky sometimes, keep an eye on them). Shoot ping-pong balls at them for a short stun, so you can get away.

Shine your torch around to find the hidden Light Column, so you can end the nightmare and get some rest.
